name: Karthik Sridharan
content: Karthik Sridharan Karthik Sridharan Associate Professor Cornell University About Me: I am currently an Associate Professor at the department of Computer Science at Cornell University. Prior to that I was a postdoctoral research associate at the University of Pennsylvania, jointly with Alexander Rakhlin and Michael Kearns. I obtained my PhD from Toyota Technological Institute at Chicago where my thesis advisor was Nathan Srebro. My primary area of research is theoretical machine learning. Current Students: August Chen, Co-advised with Ahmed El Alaoui, Department of Computer Science, Cornell University Linda Lu, Department of Computer Science, Cornell University Wilson Yoo, Department of Computer Science, Cornell University Past Students: Ayush Sekhari, Co-advised with Prof. Robert D. Kleinberg, Currently a Postdoctoral Research Scholar at MIT with Alexander Rakhlin Chuan Guo, Co-advised with Prof. Kilian Weinberger, Currently a Research Scientist at Facebook AI Research Dylan Foster, senior researcher at Microsoft Research, New England.
